channel.title: Student punished for spaghetti beliefs
channel.description:
http://www.metro.co.uk/weird/article.html?in_article_id=43272&in_page_id=2
A student has been suspended from school in America for coming to class dressed as a pirate. But the disciplinary action has provoked controversy – because the student says that the ban violates his rights, as the pirate costume is part of his religion.

item.title: Student punished for spaghetti beliefs
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:15, topic:73958”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=108595.msg1086766#msg1086766 date=1175645103]

Obviously he is just trying to cause problems, as no one actually believes in that, even the inventor of it made it as a joke.

There needs to be certain limits on the ‘beliefs’ that people have. I can’t go around killing people, get arrested for murder, and then claim that killing random people was part of my religion so they were violating my rights and have to let me go. It just wouldn’t make sense.

Cough Islam. /Cough

Excuse me, that’s very offensive. I don’t give two flying fucks if you think I’m picking on you, but that’s pretty sick stereo-typing. I have a few friends who are in the Muslim community who would go mental if someone said something like that. Think before you talk you arrogant bastard.

FYI, Jihad is why Muslim extremeists kill other people, and that’s only because they mis-interpreted the Qu’ran. It’s a lot more deeper than that, and if you pull your head out of your arse, maybe you can go and find out about it instead of making prejudice and rascist comments.
[/quote]
I stand corrected.

Cough “People who mis-interpreted Qu’ran”./Cough.[/quote]

lmfao that is so funny i got suspended for getting a 40mm pin puting it in a pare of pliers and then stabbing about 15 kids then i got a box of then and threw them around after my pun snapped in some ones arm that was so fun

Read full topic

item.title: Student punished for spaghetti beliefs
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

Screw pirates, sex toy get aways ftw!

The police were pelted with vibrators, boxes of condoms, a computer and (most impressively) a vacuum cleaner, all of which had been stolen in a raid on the shop near Krems, Austria.

item.title: Student punished for spaghetti beliefs
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:53, topic:73958”][quote author=h4xx0rz link=topic=108595.msg1087673#msg1087673 date=1175654104]

Yeah, it’s not like terrorism is an invention of the mass media, or anything. It’s not like more people die of peanut butter allergies in the United States than die of terrorist attacks, or anything like that.

I’m sure you didn’t mean it to be cocky, but be respectful…I’m allergic to peanuts, all nuts, and like alot of other things. And so are my brothers and sisters. Can you change it to something like “air pollution” or something

ADDED Hehe you made it into my signature PaulT…First PaulT, next, Mopar!!!
[/quote]

How could you possibly be offended by someone using peanut allergies as an example about something.[/quote]

Because its the kind of allergy that destroys brain cells, and he’s seriously allergic.

Read full topic

Seriously, I hope you realize that Daler Mehndi is not Muslim, but Sikh, who are often enough mistaken as Muslims for wearing turbans (when in fact an extremely low percentage of Muslims do wear them).

Not to take away from the humor of the dance from the music video, of course. Coincidently, I was listening to that exact song in the video playing (not the Europe one, the Daler Mehndi one) when I opened the link

[quote=“Skating On Java, post:45, topic:73958”][quote author=kmb link=topic=108595.msg1087110#msg1087110 date=1175648312]

WTTFF, Now Chris will flame you…

Naw, he will only flame me.
[/quote]

Meh, He called me “Stereo type” (sp???) Because i said i get pretty scared when i see a muslim with a big rucksack on a train…[/quote]

He meant that you have a stereotypical view on Muslims…which is true. There are 1.3 billion muslims in the world. Making a statement implying that you feel uncomfortable about Muslims pretty much means that you’re unhappy with 1/6 of the world’s population.

Please look up the definition of a stereotype
